item.description:
Hi everyone,

Join me for dinner at the Aegean Restaurant at 640 Arsenal Street in Watertown on Friday June 1st at 8PM. Have some calamari and wine and think how it would be if you were sitting by the sea on a Greek island!

Check out the restaurant's website at www.aegeanrestaurants.com. There is free parking and you can get to it by the T on the number 70 and 70A bus from Central Square in Cambridge. Get off at Arsenal and Arlington Street. The restaurant is at the corner there.

If you need to call me I can be reached on my cell phone at 617-448-5820.

I am looking forward to seeing you all there!

Christos

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Greek restaurant dinner outing
